Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to the New York city housing authority and mold remediation
Summary: Relates to the New York city housing authority and mold remediation; after reporting such authority shall have 15 days to remediate such reported mold.
LawCode: Amd ยง402, Pub Hous L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law, in relation to the New York city housing authority and mold remediation
